name: The Said and Done
description: This is a gin cocktail offered up by Marcine Franckowiak, a bartender at St. Mazie in Brooklyn. It’s fast, light and refreshing, and gets to the point quickly. (The New York Times)
recipeIngredient: 1 small piece of fresh peeled ginger

recipeInstructions.text:
Muddle
the ginger in a mixing glass. Add ice
and other ingredients. Shake.
Serve in a Collins glass. Top with a
splash of soda water. Garnish
with an orange twist.
